data.description: Our internal monitoring notified us of DBaaS and IdP no longer being reachable.
We have confirmed this issue to be based on a hardware fault. We are now looking for the broken system.
We have found a broken switch. However, as this is a special model, we will need to order a new one. We expect arrival tomorrow.
The new switch has been delivered and installed/set up. Testing now.
DBaaS and IdP are now reachable again. For possible future outages, we now keep a spare of this model of switch at hand.
